website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Max 270, Nike’s first lifestyle Air unit flaunts an exaggerated heel Air Max unit (the tallest yet measuring 32-mm), a cleatie construction, a breathable knit and mesh upper in numerous colorways that collectively makes a statement and gives the silhouette its signature look.This Air Max model ticks off all the boxes concerning comfort, support, superb fit, and lightness, which makes up for its expensive price point.
pros: Several reviewers are beyond impressed with the comfort of the Nike Air Max 270
The Air Max 270 is a stylish shoe, according to numerous buyers
Many purchasers say they love this shoe so much that they will order other colors
Some reviewers state that this Air Max is exceptionally lightweight
A lot of reviewers report that they like the way this shoe fits their feet
There are a handful of comments on the excellent foot support of this shoe
The heel Air unit is phenomenal, according to a couple of reviewers
Some reviewers report that this shoe gets them lots of compliments from other people
Plenty of colorways are made available for both men’s and women’s Nike Air Max 270 shoes
cons: A few reviewers say that the opening of the shoe is too tight
Some are disappointed that some colorways are hard to cop
A couple of reviewers comment that this Air Max runs a bit narrow in the toes
Some reviewers think that the Nike 270 Air Max is not worth its expensive price tag

customer_reviews.title: Fake trainers
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are fake was out in the rain and Nike tick washed off do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better customer service would have got 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: So I originally left a one star review because when I compared these to my originals they were different. Different labels, different sole, slight different printing. I gave them a chance to respond and not until 6 days later did they ask why I thought they were fake. Just kept telling me how long they had been in business. Had the trainers validated by Nike today in store but gives the high profile nature of why these trainers were changed them I’d expect a more informed staff.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One of the runners the insole seems to be coming up to high or something, very uncomfortable actually unwearable
customer_reviews.author: Colm

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: I have to send them back I'd had a red mark on the right Trainer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my partner He is happy with them They are perfect for summer fits perfect very nice looking
customer_reviews.author: RoalArlo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy he loves the trainers are exactly was we expected.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Exchange of my purchase request.
customer_reviews.text: Although I purchased my normal size which I always do, they are too small and very uncomfortable. I would like to exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are made for walking👍
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and very comfy fit my feet bang on 👍
customer_reviews.author: alan murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nike air max  270 white
customer_reviews.text: Thought they might be fake. But genuine and very quick delivery. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd W.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it !!
customer_reviews.text: Using casually. Very uncomfortable. Walked for 30 minutes. Feet hurts all day. It feels like your feet sliding down and the toes are hitting the front. I got one size bigger because my size was too tight so I had to reorder and return. It’s definitely not worth the price. I feel like I am wearing army boots or something
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bun paying £400+ for these shoes. They're cool looking, not worth that price
customer_reviews.author: George Jones

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Max 270 Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Nike Air Max 270 Running Shoe is designed for maximum support of the entire foot. The Max Air unit on the heel offers reactive cushioning kilometer after kilometer. Articulated flex grooves to optimize forefoot flexibility. Rubber sole for ideal traction and resistance
